title: Multiplication by $$-1$$
text: Multiplying a number by $$-1$$ gives its opposite: $$-1a=-a$$.
speech: Multiplying a number by  minus, 1  gives its opposite:  negative 1 a is equal to negative a .
pacedSpeech: gives its opposite:   negative 1 a is equal to negative a

title: Answer
text: Since multiiplying $$-11$$ by $$-1$$ gives the opposite of $$-11$$, our answer is the opposite of $$-11$$. What is that?
speech: Since multiiplying  minus 11  by  negative 1  gives the opposite of  negative 11 , our answer is the opposite of  negative 11 . What is that?
pacedSpeech: , our answer is the opposite of   negative 11
